intent_atoms.description: Implement automation for refreshing MP4RABoxes.json from the upstream registry and document the maintenance workflow.
The automation must successfully refresh MP4RABoxes.json from the upstream registry and produce a documented maintenance workflow.
Extend downstream validation and reporting to consume the enriched MP4RA metadata emitted by ParsePipeline.live()

functional_units.name: MP4RABoxes.json Refresh Automation
functional_units.description: Automates the process of refreshing MP4RABoxes.json from the upstream registry and documents the maintenance workflow.

functional_units.name: Enriched MP4RA Metadata Consumption
functional_units.description: Extends downstream validation and reporting to consume enriched MP4RA metadata emitted by ParsePipeline.live().

functional_units.name: Real-time Streaming Event Parser Follow-ups
functional_units.description: Outlines additional downstream parser follow-ups enabled by real-time streaming events, such as catalog integration test coverage and fallback handling.
